metadata.synopsis: This is a small frog in the swamp lands.She has been twisted by Ethel's magic and is desperately trying not to hurt the player - doing everything she can to hold back. If Ethel is dead, the frog is very cheerful and sing song - hopping about. If they player asks for a reward, she cheerfully spits on their shoes and hops off.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Kill the hag and the frog will lead you to a reward.
